title: Digital Diary
desc: A feature-rich digital diary application with prayer tracking, prayer timings, a personalized dashboard with analytics, daily diary entries, and more.

title: Tech Shop
desc: An e-commerce web application for a modern tech shop, offering laptops, smartphones, accessories, and gadgets with a smooth shopping experience, secure checkout, and responsive design.

title: Chat App
desc: A simple realtime chat app built with Next.js 15, TailwindCSS, ShadCN UI, and Pusher. Features include realtime messaging, dark/light mode, responsive design, and clean UI components.
